DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Donor Greater Than or Equal To 3 Month Within United Kingdom Present Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication of whether the donor spent three or more months cumulatively in the UK any time from 1980-1996 as provided by the primary history source.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tissue Donor Greater Than or Equal To 3 Month Within United Kingdom Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::3_One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._On the inside; contained in._A country in western Europe, comprising islands, including England, Scotland, Wales, and the northern one-sixth of the island of Ireland, between the North Atlantic Ocean and the North Sea, northwest of France._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Concepts.definition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Property.preferredName: Greater Than or Equal To Integer::3 Month Within United Kingdom Present
Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::3:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:On the inside; contained in.:A country in western Europe, comprising islands, including England, Scotland, Wales, and the northern one-sixth of the island of Ireland, between the North Atlantic Ocean and the North Sea, northwest of France.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

A country in western Europe, comprising islands, including England, Scotland, Wales, and the northern one-sixth of the island of Ireland, between the North Atlantic Ocean and the North Sea, northwest of France.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.
